text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product title.

Product title:
81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag College Work City Casual Everyday Messenger Bag

Product features:
Dimensions: H 24cm, W 32cm, D 8cm. Adjustable strap length 143cm with buckle closure.
100% genuine goat leather which ages gracefully and softens with use. brand new bag may also have a distinctive leather smell which will fade with 4-6 weeks of regular use.
Flap over closure with buckle closure. 3 inner compartments and 2 inner zipped pocket, as well 2 external pockets with press studs.
Weight 650g.
This unique bag suitable for carrying iPad, festival day out, dinner, business meeting, everyday use.

Product description:
text.Response A: The 81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag is made from 100% genuine goat leather and features a flap over closure with buckle closure, 3 inner compartments, 2 inner zipped pockets, 2 external pockets, and an adjustable strap with buckle closure. This versatile bag is ideal for use as a work bag, casual bag, or everyday bag, and can be used to carry an iPad or other essentials for a day out or business meeting.
text.Response B: Vintage crossover dark brown goat leather bag with flap over and buckle closure. Two external pockets at the front with press studs closure. Three inner compartments and two zipped pockets. The leather strap is adjustable with buckle closure. 100% genuine goat leather which ages gracefully and softens with use. Brand new bag may also have a distinctive leather smell which will fade with 4-6 weeks of regular use.  Height 24cm. Width 32cm. Depth 8cm. Strap length 143cm. Weight 650g. The leather is naturally tanned without using chemicals so the bags feature variations in the tone and texture in the leather, making each bag unique. This bag is suitable for iPad, festival day out or even fancy dinner with an authentic look.

Product description:

Response A

The 81stgeneration Genuine Vintage Satchel Shoulder Bag is made from 100% genuine goat leather and features a flap over closure with buckle closure, 3 inner compartments, 2 inner zipped pockets, 2 external pockets, and an adjustable strap with buckle closure. This versatile bag is ideal for use as a work bag, casual bag, or everyday bag, and can be used to carry an iPad or other essentials for a day out or business meeting.

Response B

Vintage crossover dark brown goat leather bag with flap over and buckle closure. Two external pockets at the front with press studs closure. Three inner compartments and two zipped pockets. The leather strap is adjustable with buckle closure. 100% genuine goat leather which ages gracefully and softens with use. Brand new bag may also have a distinctive leather smell which will fade with 4-6 weeks of regular use. Height 24cm. Width 32cm. Depth 8cm. Strap length 143cm. Weight 650g. The leather is naturally tanned without using chemicals so the bags feature variations in the tone and texture in the leather, making each bag unique. This bag is suitable for iPad, festival day out or even fancy dinner with an authentic look.
